trans-unit.source: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
trans-unit.target: 타이머를 설정하고 비동기적으로 타이머 만료를 기다리는 논리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
When notified that its timer has expired, a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> completes its execution.
trans-unit.target: 해당 타이머가 만료되었다는 알림 메시지를 받으면 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>가 실행을 완료합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set a time out on the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution.
trans-unit.target: 실행을 다시 시작하기 전에 워크플로가 일시 중지되도록 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>에서 제한 시간을 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You specify the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> using <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
This causes your workflow to pause until the specified <xref:System.TimeSpan> has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 그러면 지정된 <xref:System.TimeSpan>이 경과될 때까지 워크플로가 일시 중지됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class runs the code method associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 클래스는 활동이 시작되어 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> 속성을 초기화하는 데 코드 기반 메서드를 사용할 수 있기 전에 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 이벤트와 관련된 코드 메서드를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.
The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>에 도달한 후에 타이머 알림이 발생하므로 지연 시간이 길어질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment.
trans-unit.target: 지연 시간이 길어지는 원인 중 하나로 워크플로가 시스템 스트레스가 높은 서버 환경에서 실행 중인 경우를 들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Simple State Machine.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 Simple State Machine을 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the time-out duration starts.
This event should not be used to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>에 대한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>을 설정하는 데 이 이벤트를 사용하면 안 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.
trans-unit.target: 대신 시간 제한 기간은 워크플로의 `InitializeComponent` 메서드에 설정해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration" /> event.
Gets the name of the workflow queue that will be delivered when the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: 타이머가 만료되면 전달되는 워크플로 큐의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
Creates the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
<paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
Cancels the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
<paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The object that raised the event.
The previously typed event arguments.
Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 구독 대상 이벤트가 발생할 때의 처리 절차를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.
A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.
The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 설정된 기간은 워크플로가 다음 활동을 계속하기 전에 유휴 상태로 유지되는 시간을 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property to 3 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 속성 값을 3초로 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that `delay2` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration" /> property.
The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> 필드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
